TopicTitle: Having problems with loading the game after 1.12 update

Articles.Content: My problem is when start my game it goes to the loading screen but then at the bottom (where it says loading parts or that sort of thing) it just says loading part upgrades. The loading screen images are changing but the bottom text is stuck like that for 3 hours. I’ve closed the game a loaded it again but the same problem occurs.  I’m wondering if anyone else is having this problem or anyone knows how I might be able to fix this.

24 minutes ago, PowSeaPea said:

My problem is when start my game it goes to the loading screen but then at the bottom (where it says loading parts or that sort of thing) it just says loading part upgrades. The loading screen images are changing but the bottom text is stuck like that for 3 hours. I’ve closed the game a loaded it again but the same problem occurs.  I’m wondering if anyone else is having this problem or anyone knows how I might be able to fix this.

I had exactly this issue, it turns out it was mods.

In my case it was EVE/SVE so, for now at least, I just have to do without clouds.

Maybe that’s my problem since I use mods as well but I don’t use EVE so I’ll have to find which one is causing me trouble. Thanks so much for your help!
A pleasure, and welcome to the forums.
Modding issue has been moved to modded support.
